Description:
------------
MotorStorm team, having turned to dust bowls and forests, has been included in the bags and shipped. Their destination: a coastal city that is in the midst of a natural disaster - and what better place to launch another festival MotorStorm?
Spread over a period of three days, the backdrop to MotorStorm Revelation is rapidly disintegrating - You are there when it happens, and this is the race of survival! Throughout the game the city is torn to pieces in real time, such as race. Routes will be affected, as well as our emerging game. Buggies with walls collapse as half-pipes. Large trucks on the roofs of skyscrapers collapse. Superbikes by fire in the basement of the huge cracks. Supercars blinking lights on tap through the subways and sewers. I've never raced on the edge of madness like this.
